Title: Candlelight's Woman
Actors: Carrie Ng, Kwok-Keung Cheung, Cammy Choi
Plot: Lam Hung is a loudmouth street hooker with a useless crippled gambling-addicted husband Ching and son Man. Hung's friend Fei is an nightclub hostess, and Fei's lesbian sister Mei/Mooi seems bent on total self destruction after her...
